title: Disqualified from promotion series after dodge
body: Today i was in my promotion series and I had 1 win and 1 loss, in my last game of my promotion series in champion select we had a way worse team comp then our enemy and I decided to dodge, when i logged in again it said "you are disqualified from your promotion series due to inactivity". Is this a bug or does it automatically disqualify you from your promotion series when you dodge?

replies.body: Dodging gives you a loss for your series.
No, when you dodge while in series, it counts as a match loss.
It tells you as much on the warning screen before you exit.
